name: inelegant
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
not attractive, especially because of being awkward in movement or manner: an inelegant posture inelegant surroundings
not skilful or polite in dealing with or expressing something: Too many programs are ugly: inelegant, unreliable and not very useful. Opposite
elegant
More examplesFewer examplesWorse, the curtains looked inelegant, ill-hung and cheap.Leggings are absurdly inelegant and tremendously unflattering.It was inelegant, a faux pas even, to speak of expenses, costs and salaries.The process is still inelegant but it works.
